name: portfolio
desc: A fully-featured portfolio website with dynamic content and clean UI, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. with responsive design.

name: to-do
desc: A responsive To-Do List web app built with react, Allows users to add, delete, and mark tasks. Data is stored using Local Storage.

name: user managment
desc: A user management web app built with React. Users can be added, searched by name in real-time, and deleted individually uses local storage.

name: weather-app
desc: A responsive weather app built with HTML, CSS, and Js. Shows temperature, weather conditions, and wind speed for any searched city using real-time API data.

name: quiz-app
desc: A dynamic quiz application built with html, css, javaScript Features multiple-choice questions, real-time feedback on answers.

name: youtube page
desc: A responsive YouTube homepage clone built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features a navigation bar, sidebar, video  grid layout.

name: calculator
desc: A functional calculator web app built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Supports basic arithmetic operations with a responsive user interface.

name: react router
desc: A multi-page React application featuring dynamic routing using React Router. Enables smooth navigation between pages.
